user_instruction: 'Respond to Emily'"'"'s email about her patent application (emily@entrepreneur.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Information Needed to Draft Reply to Emily’s Patent Application Email

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Emily (emily@entrepreneur.com) emailed us with questions about the status of her patent application, and I’d like to send her a comprehensive reply today.

Could you please:

1. Check our Innovatech Gmail inbox for Emily’s most recent message (and any related thread) to confirm her specific questions or concerns.  
2. Review her application workspace in Notion—especially the current status, recent notes, and upcoming deadlines.  
3. Summarize any key points, outstanding tasks, and next steps we should communicate to her.  
4. Forward or flag any attachments or reference documents she included.

If you notice anything time-sensitive on the calendar (e.g., USPTO deadlines or scheduled calls), please include that as well.

A brief update by the end of the morning would be perfect so I can draft and send Emily an accurate response this afternoon.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:

A brief update by the end of the morning would be perfect so I can draft and send Emily an accurate response this afternoon.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
